other_title: Di Gi Charat Flower Viewing Special (Japanese)
デ・ジ・キャラット お花見すぺしゃる (Japanese)
plot: Each episode has its own story. Ep 1: Piyoko and gangs sneaked into Dejiko's closet and occupied her room; Dejiko fought back. Ep 2: Gamer gangs went to watch cherry blossom. Dejiko, Puchiko, Rabi~En~Rose and Gema took the spot under a big cherry tree while others went to buy foods and drinks, but soon Piyoko came and wanted the same spot. Ep 3: Takurou sent Puchiko a set of preschool uniform for her to go to preschool. Ep 4: Dejiko got sick and acted wierd, so Rabi~En~Rose embarked a quest to find a mysterious acorn to cure Dejiko.
opening_theme: "Megami ni Naritai (女神になりたい; I Want to Become a Goddess) ~for a yours~" by Masami Okui
ending_theme: "see you see you" by Asami Sanada, Miyuki Sawashiro, and Kyoko Hikami
